gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Coal Resource Data, Derived from the National Coal Resource Data System: Indiana, 2010

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This ESRI ArcGIS (version 10.0) point shapefile is an index to the location of 13,722 public point-source coal resource data points in Indiana. This shapefile includes location and coal resource information for each data point. Detailed location and stratigraphic information for each data point are stored in a separate Microsoft Access database named NCRDS_Indiana2010.mdb that is contained in the Indiana Geological Survey Report of Progress 39. COAL_NCRDS_2010_IN shows data points that are included in NCRDS_Indiana2010.mdb.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: The purpose of this ESRI ArcInfo point shapefile is to provide an index to NCRDS_Indiana2010.mdb: The Indiana Geological Survey National Coal Resources Data System database, a Microsoft Access database of public, point-source coal resource data in Indiana. Since 1980, staff members of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) have collected and entered coal resource information into the NCRDS_Indiana2010.mdb database as a cooperative project with the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS). The purpose of this project is to provide a means of rapid retrieval of point-source coal resource information, including coal location, thickness, depth, and other parameters.

This product is distributed "AS-IS" without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including but not limited to warranties of suitability of a particular purpose or use. These data are intended for use only at the published scale or smaller and are for reference purposes only. They are not to be construed as a legal document or survey instrument. A detailed on-the-ground survey and historical analysis of a single site may differ from this data. gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: This file is available to anyone, but access may be contingent on written request, specific terms relevant to the agency or person making the request, and (or) current freedom of information statutes in the state of Indiana.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: The Indiana Geological Survey Coal Stratigraphic Database, Indiana Geological Survey Report of Progress 39

gmd:environmentDescription.gco:CharacterString: ESRI ArcGIS version 10.0 point shapefile, Microsoft Windows 7.0, file size 34.3 Mb

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: This point shapefile contains 13,722 data points. The coals that are indexed in this point shapefile are limited to coal members of Indiana.

Data points were checked to determine whether or not all data points are located within the Pennsylvanian System, as depicted in a 1:500,000-scale ESRI ArcGIS polygon coverage of Indiana bedrock information. Since this database is limited to data points of coal resource information, one should expect all data points to lie within the coal-bearing Pennsylvanian System. This test was performed by displaying this point coverage on the bedrock polygon coverage using ESRI ArcView software. The result of this check revealed that all but a small fraction of the data points were located within the areal extent of the Pennsylvanian System boundary. Those few data points that were outside of the Pennsylvanian System were within one mile of the boundary and are assumed to be valid data. Spot checks were conducted to compare the values that appear in the fields named "Twnship" and "Range" with townships and ranges in the Public Land Survey System (PLSS) of Indiana. Several discrepancies were noted but not corrected. Coal beds in Indiana seldom exceed 15 feet in thickness. However, inspection of thickness values indicates that some records exceed reasonable limits for coal thickness.

The accuracy of the location information contained in this ESRI ArcGIS point shapefile is dependent upon the accuracy of the source data of each data point, and the accuracy with which these data were manually entered into the database.

The accuracy of the location information contained in this ESRI ArcGIS point shapefile is dependent upon the accuracy of the source data of each data point, and the accuracy with which these data were manually entered into the database.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: A Microsoft Access database named "NCRDS_Indiana2010.mdb" published as Indiana Geological Survey Report of Progress 39 was used to create an ESRI ArcGIS point shapefile. The table named "LOCATION" was loaded in ESRI ArcMap. The 'Add X Y" command was used to display all the points. The "Export" command was then used to export the datapoints as a shapefile named "COAL_NCRDS_2010_IN.shp."

This metadata was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v. 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v. 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (United States Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."
The source contributed location and attribute information for 13,722 public point-source coal resource data points in Indiana.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: NCRDS_Indiana2010.mdb: The Indiana Geological Survey National Coal Resources Data System database, a Microsoft Access database of public, point-source coal resource data in Indiana, published as Indiana Geological Survey Report of Progress 39

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Date of most recent update to the database

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Metadata was created as or translated to ISO 19139 for inclusion in the Big Ten Academic Alliance Geoportal.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Big Ten Academic Alliance Geospatial Data Project

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: Big Ten Academic Alliance Geospatial Data Project
